医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现临床催眠比认知行为疗法治疗潮热更有效针对潮热和其他更年期症状的非激素选择越来越受欢迎，特别是对于因健康并发症而无法服用激素的女性。认知行为疗法和临床催眠是常见的非激素治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-finds-clinical-hypnosis-more- effective-than-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-for-hot-flashes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-finds-clinical-hypnosis-more- effective-than-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-for-hot-flashes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53bb9c2a-7492-4c2c-ab99-3bafd358d935 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 12:19:24 -0400 Study finds clinical hypnosis more effective than cognitive behavioral therapy for hot flashes
分析揭示激素疗法对 80 岁以下女性的益处更年期协会的 2022 年激素治疗立场声明建议，65 岁以上的女性可以在适当的咨询和风险评估的情况下继续使用激素治疗 (HT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Analysis-reveals-benefits-of-hormone-therapy-for-women-up-to-age-80.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Analysis-reveals-benefits-of-hormone-therapy-for-women-up-to-age-80.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88400e89-9c86-4ccc-9c0f-c32a85752a7c Tue, 10 Sep 2024 12:17:48 -0400 Analysis reveals benefits of hormone therapy for women up to age 80
研究表明创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 与海湾战争女退伍军人提前绝经的风险较高有关创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 会导致一系列不良的心理健康影响，但身体副作用也很常见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-links-PTSD-to-higher-risk-of-early-menopause-in-Gulf-War-female-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-links-PTSD-to-higher-risk-of-early-menopause-in-Gulf-War-female-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38a85b02-c71b-4620-bd6b-71fd3eb81321 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 12:14:14 -0400 Study links PTSD to higher risk of early menopause in Gulf War female veterans
新的人工智能模型创建癌症组织的虚拟着色以增强诊断最近发表在《自然机器智能》上的一项研究介绍了一种先进的人工智能（AI）模型，能够创建癌症组织的虚拟着色。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-AI-model-creates-virtual-colorations-of-cancer-tissue-for-enhanced-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-AI-model-creates-virtual-colorations-of-cancer-tissue-for-enhanced-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99e18748-2c9e-45c3-95a8-080748ed5ea0 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 09:35:24 -0400 New AI model creates virtual colorations of cancer tissue for enhanced diagnostics
密歇根大学研究揭示异丙酚如何影响大脑连接和意识在医院手术室和重症监护室，异丙酚是一种首选药物，广泛用于使患者镇静以使其舒适，或使他们在侵入性操作中完全失去知觉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/UM-study-reveals-how-propofol-affects-brain-connectivity-and-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/UM-study-reveals-how-propofol-affects-brain-connectivity-and-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1f737fd-4398-4a43-9a6b-9043d587063a Tue, 10 Sep 2024 09:29:10 -0400 U-M study reveals how propofol affects brain connectivity and consciousness
研究人员发现白癜风背后机制的线索皮肤色素沉着障碍影响着世界各地的人们。其中之一是白癜风，据说全世界的发病率为 1-2%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Researchers-uncover-clues-to-the-mechanism-behind-vitiligo.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Researchers-uncover-clues-to-the-mechanism-behind-vitiligo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc91496f-9b29-4d82-86ed-148cdc95805b Tue, 10 Sep 2024 09:22:18 -0400 Researchers uncover clues to the mechanism behind vitiligo
新的规范神经影像库为脑损伤研究设定标准随着神经影像学的最新进展，从定性输出转向定量输出，需要了解正常数据是什么样子，以便能够将这些进展应用于创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 的诊断和结果预测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-normative-neuroimaging-library-sets-standard-for-brain-injury-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-normative-neuroimaging-library-sets-standard-for-brain-injury-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d5c0189-5386-4d17-af99-88134cb72ba4 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 09:01:10 -0400 New normative neuroimaging library sets standard for brain injury research
ACA 招生平台因涉嫌外国获取消费者数据而被暂停由于怀疑印度可能会获取美国消费者的个人信息，监管机构于 8 月份突然禁止两家大型私营部门注册网站访问《平价医疗法案》市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/ACA-enrollment-platforms-suspended-over-alleged-foreign-access-to-consumer-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/ACA-enrollment-platforms-suspended-over-alleged-foreign-access-to-consumer-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=812df04e-a481-4bc2-a2e7-a84534cf7d74 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 07:21:24 -0400 ACA enrollment platforms suspended over alleged foreign access to consumer data
出生后不久肠道中就存在天然益生菌关于新生儿肠道微生物群的研究结果揭示了驱动微生物组组装的关键双歧杆菌物种及其开发个性化益生菌的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Natural-probiotic-present-in-gut-shortly-after-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Natural-probiotic-present-in-gut-shortly-after-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd0dbdba-2a6d-48b0-878c-eb3acc0a0844 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 06:59:00 -0400 Natural probiotic present in gut shortly after birth
与根茎类蔬菜和南瓜类蔬菜相比，西兰花等十字花科蔬菜可降低血压每日摄入十字花科蔬菜可显着降低轻度高血压成人的血压，凸显其对心血管健康的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Cruciferous-vegetables-like-broccoli-reduce-blood-Pressure-compared-to-root-and-squash-vegetables.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Cruciferous-vegetables-like-broccoli-reduce-blood-Pressure-compared-to-root-and-squash-vegetables.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d16db4a-8662-415a-81dd-190aba5894f1 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 05:56:00 -0400 Cruciferous vegetables like broccoli reduce blood pressure compared to root and squash vegetables
